meanings.sent1: The secondary character in the story played a small role.
meanings.sent2: The secondary goal of the project was to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The secondary dessert was a surprise hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her secondary role in the play shone brightly with her talent.
meanings.sent5: The secondary color on the painting added depth and contrast.

meanings.definition: Not directly obtained from a source.
meanings.sent1: The information was secondary and came from a reliable website.
meanings.sent2: The secondary data supported the main findings of the research.
meanings.sent3: His secondary explanation was even more confusing than the first.
meanings.sent4: The secondary route took us through scenic back roads.
meanings.sent5: The secondary evidence pointed to a different conclusion.

meanings.definition: A school level below high school.
meanings.sent1: She attended a secondary school before moving on to college.
meanings.sent2: The secondary had a fun field trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The secondary students organized a charity bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The secondary's football team won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The secondary's science fair showcased impressive projects.
